title: How I Improved FPS
body:
Hi All

I thought I share my experience in improving FPS.

Before that, I have had drop of FPS whenever there is a Sona, Tresh or any particle heavy champs around. Also FPS dropped heavily to 02 at the shop. Now I have a constant FPS 120 and above.

What I did was
1. Add 8G mem additional to what I already have which was 8G DDR3 1666 (note: Have chrome running with several active tabs going on, preloaded systray sfware going on and with LoL Operating, mem usage was around 75% on average)
2. Install a liquid cooler on the CPU ( corsair H60 to be precise)

Thats all I did. And now the game runs marvelously. Hope this will enlighten some headaches out there.
